title: 103_hr3349
content: First Lunar Landing Anniversary Commemorative Coin Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to issue one-dollar coins to commemorate the 25th anniversary of the first lunar landing. Mandates that surcharges received from coin sales be paid to: (1) the Neil Armstrong Air and Space Museum : (2) the Smithsonian Institution for the National Air and Space Museum, and (3) the Treasury for reduction of the national debt.
